explanation:
code_hardening: Added final modifiers to Context and AttributeSet parameters, used defensive null checks around TypedArray usage, and ensured recycle() is only called when non-null with clear lifecycle handling.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented a constructor named CheckableRelativeLayout matching the existing class, called super(context, attrs) for RelativeLayout, and assigned values to the already-declared fields mCheckDrawable, mRadioDrawable, and mIsChecked.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: none; preserved the original behavior of themed drawable lookup for multiple and single choice with null fallback and initialization of mIsChecked to false.
refactoring: Consolidated drawable assignment through local variables to allow safe assignment to final fields and reduced duplication while keeping behavior unchanged.
misc: Reformatted code and comments for consistency with the renamed CheckableRelativeLayout constructor; no new custom API calls were introduced.
